featured.text: The 70-year-old professor sued the university for age _____, because his teaching contract had not been renewed.
He believed in the ability of nature to renew itself without the 38 of humans.

definition.zh_def: 使恢復，重新開始或更新某物的狀態或效力。
definition.en_def: To make something new, fresh, or strong again; to restore or replace.
definition.example: She decided to renew her gym membership for another year.
